title: Invalid token
message: You need a valid authentication to the API. You need to send a valid token (which has not expired and whose the IP address correspond to yours).

title: Invalid role
message: You need a valid role to access to the API.

title: Invalid login
message: Les informations de connexion sont incorrect. L'email ou le mot de passe ne sont pas valides.

title: Error with this property
message: Le champs ':key' n'existe pas ou peut contenir une erreur dans le format.

title: Id does not exist
message: No content found with this id in the table :key.

title: OK
message: Le contenu a bien été récupéré.

title: Successful deleted
message: The content is deleted or archived with success
